title: 187- Faith, Sexuality, and Gender - With Preston Sprinkle
description:
Mike talks with Preston Sprinkle about Faith, Sexuality and Gender within the Church. Should these be such focused on issues? What does it mean to be a Eucharist centered community? As always, thanks for listening! 

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
